name: Anti Scurvy Brigade
description:
The evil Kings Ferdinand, Isabella, and George III have declared that they do not care if sailors get scurvy! The intrepid Leaf Eric Son has decided to single handedly defy these evil Kings and deliver giant fruit from the bottom of the Great Salt Lake to the citizens of California. Using ancient Peruvian magicks, he teleports the fruit onto his ship and drives his ship forward without any sails.

Gameplay - Sail your boat filled with fruit to the purple areas in front of the piers to drop them off to the citizens. Your ship is automatically upgraded when you deliver enough fruit. Follow the compass to find your next destination. Make sure your boat doesn't tip over! Push the sides of the boat to stabilize it with your great strength!

Controls - WASD to move; Space to jump; Stand in the blue area to drive your ship forward; Stand in the red area to turn your ship; Press Backspace to reset your ship and player to the starting position

Credits - Natasha Fritz, Kevin Nickel, Drew Poole
